As a Chicagoan, (and GLPI investor) I would say "Not so fast".  The temporary BALY casino put in downtown Chicago (the only one in town) has not come close to it's projected traffic or revenue. Not to say it won't work out but there is no track record that says it wil be smooth sailing.
